props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the button will be disabled

props.name: disableElevation
props.description: If true, no elevation is used

props.name: disableFocusRipple
props.description: If true, the keyboard focus ripple will be disabled

props.name: disableRipple
props.description: If true, the ripple effect will be disabled

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the button will take up the full width of its container

props.name: href
props.description: The URL to link to when the button is clicked

props.name: onClick
props.description: Callback fired when the button is clicked

props.name: sx
props.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles
